info.title: Pecos River Traders API
info.description: API for Pecos River Traders e-commerce platform

get.description: Get a single blog post by slug.
Get a single category with its products.

post.description: Apply coupon to order (called during checkout).

get.description: Get all FAQs grouped by category.

get.summary: Get loyalty points balance and history
get.description: Get user's loyalty points balance and history.
Get all orders (admin) or user's orders.

post.description: Create a guest order (no authentication required).

get.description: Get order by order number (for confirmation page).
Get orders by user ID (for PHP session-based auth).
Get all products with filtering, sorting, and pagination.
Get a single product by UPC.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force delete even with active orders

get.description: Get a single product by numeric ID.
Get all images for a product.

post.description: Upload images for a product (Admin only).

order.description: Array of image IDs in desired order

get.description: Admin: Get all reviews for moderation.

get.summary: Check if product is in wishlist
get.description: Check if product is in wishlist.
Get wishlist by user ID (for PHP session-based auth).

delete.summary: Remove item from wishlist by user ID
delete.description: Remove item from wishlist by user ID (for PHP session-based auth).
